overview:
Josh Stuhler is a internet entrepreneur that creates websites with a common need. His latest adventure was www.Top25s.com that allows users to go to one place for all there Top 25 needs. He wanted to do this because he felt like you just were not getting enough information with the standard Top 10 lists.

When he is not stuck behind the computer, he likes to go out and have fun with his friends. He is a volunteer firefighter, and he also served 2 tours overseas with the United States Army.

Fun Fact about Mr. Stuhler, his dream is to eventually own or at least drive a Lamborghini Gallardo Spyder.
